short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide YouTube's suggested videos for better focus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Undistracted - Enhance Your YouTube Experience with Focus Mode

Undistracted is a Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused and productive while using YouTube. It minimizes distractions by hiding suggested videos and thumbnails, allowing you to concentrate on the content that matters most to you.

Key Features

ðŸŽ¯ Focus Mode
Hide Suggested Videos: Removes the related videos section on the watch page.
Clean Home Page: Hides video thumbnails on the YouTube home page for a distraction-free experience.

Persistent Settings: Focus mode remains active as you navigate between videos and pages.

Seamless Integration: Works silently in the background without disrupting your viewing experience.

â˜• Support the Developer
Buy Me a Coffee: A small button allows you to support ongoing development.
Discreet Presence.

Why Use Undistracted?

Reduce Distractions: Eliminate the temptation of clicking on unrelated content.
Boost Productivity: Stay focused on educational or work-related videos without clutter.

Improve Concentration: Create a minimalist environment to help you absorb content better.

How It Works

Install Undistracted from the Chrome Web Store.
Toggle Focus Mode: Click on the Undistracted icon to enable or disable focus mode.
Start Watching: Enjoy a cleaner, distraction-free YouTube experience.
